output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in transfer function allows a potential attacker to set any user's balance. Integer overflow in transfer function allows a potential attacker to set any user's balance, aka the 'transferAll' issue.

Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a potential attacker to set any user's balance. Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a potential attacker to set any user's balance, aka the 'transferAll' issue.

approveAndCall function allows attackers to steal arbitrary assets due to unrestricted call to arbitrary addresses. Restricted call in approveAndCall function allows attackers to steal arbitrary assets, aka the 'approveAndCall' issue.

distributeToken function allows attackers to control the distribution of tokens, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue. Bad randomness in distributeToken function allows attackers to control the distribution of tokens, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue.
ERC20Token constructor allows attackers to set any user's balance, aka the 'setOwner' issue. Typo in ERC20Token constructor allows attackers to set any user's balance, aka the 'setOwner' issue.
